synopsis.text: Liu Bei Unicorn Gundam, Guan Yu Nu Gundam, and Zhang Fei God Gundam are brought together by fate in a world ravaged by relentless warfare and a mysterious epidemic known as the Yellow Zombie Virus. Once thriving nations now lie in ruins, and the survivors are forced to seek refuge in fortified cities, relying on a limited energy source called 'Trinity' for protection. The cities, isolated by walls, are governed by lords, with the tyrannical Dong Zhuo causing chaos since the demise of the previous ruler. Inspired by their shared destiny, the three young heroes embark on a mission to save the world, their determination igniting a new chapter in history and sparking a great transformation. Witness the rise of new heroes in this epic tale of courage and change.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
